title: Senior UX Designer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Utforma och fastställa den digitala kundresan och dess tillämpning i digitala gränssnitt.  

Analysera och bereda hur digitala produkter och funktioner ska utformas för optimal UX.  

Skapa prototyper, designlösningar och underlag för utvecklingsteamet.  

Samarbeta med utvecklare, externa intressenter och leverantörer vid framtagning och tester av nya digitala lösningar.  

Säkerställa tillgänglighetsstandarder och god användarupplevelse enligt etablerade UX-principer.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 8 års erfarenhet av UX-design för digitala kundgränssnitt riktade mot en extern marknad.
* Högskoleexamen inom Design, Interaktionsdesign eller Grafisk design (eller motsvarande kompetens).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Figma eller andra etablerade designverktyg.
* Stark analytisk förmåga för att förstå användarbeteenden.
* God förståelse för samspelet mellan teknik och människa.
* Förmåga att undervisa och förmedla UX-principer från koncept till implementation.
* Kunskap om tillgänglighetsstandarder.

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med kundresor.
* Kunskap om responsiv design.
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 08-03-2025 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: UX Designer
description:
**Role Overview**


We are looking for a passionate UX Designer who will take ownership of the entire user experience journey—ensuring that our customers can effortlessly leverage CarbonCloud’s platform. You will collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and key stakeholders to translate complex carbon footprint data into an intuitive, engaging user experience.

 **Key Responsibilities**

* Conduct user research, usability testing, and user interviews to gather insights and identify pain points.
* Translate research findings into personas, user journeys, wireframes, and interactive prototypes.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless design handover and an optimal user interface.
* Maintain and iterate on our design system, adhering to brand guidelines while incorporating UX best practices.
* Drive continuous improvement of the user experience through A/B testing, data analysis, and feedback loops.

  

**Qualifications**

* Proven experience in UX design, preferably within a SaaS or tech-related environment.
* Skilled in design and prototyping tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD, or similar).
* Strong portfolio showcasing problem-solving skills and user-centric design processes.
* Ability to communicate effectively in English (Swedish language skills are a plus).
* Familiarity with agile workflows and working in cross-functional teams.
* A passion for sustainability and desire to make a meaningful impact.

  

**What We Offer**

* An opportunity to shape the UX of an industry-leading climate impact platform.
* A dynamic, international work culture focused on innovation, collaboration, and personal growth.
* Competitive compensation and benefits.
* Flexible work environment with the possibility to work partially remote.
* The chance to make a real difference in the fight against climate change!

title: UX Designer
description:
**Vi söker en UX/UI Designer för ett långsiktigt kunduppdrag!**

  

Har du en passion för att skapa intuitiva och estetiskt tilltalande användarupplevelser? Vill du arbeta med moderna AI-teknologier i en innovativ och framåtlutad miljö? Då kan detta vara uppdraget för dig! Vi söker nu en erfaren UX Designer för ett långsiktigt uppdrag hos en kund i Göteborg. Du kommer ges stora möjligheter att bidra med din kreativitet och förslag på lösningar med ett löfte om stort inflytande på lösningen baserat på din gedigna erfarenhet!

### **Om uppdraget**


Vår kund befinner sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och utforskar nya möjligheter att driva industri 4.0 och utveckla smarta fabriker. För att stärka teamet och bygga nya innovativa lösningar för prediktivt underhåll och processoptimering söker vi nu en UX/UI Designer. Rollen innebär att du får en UX-roll med ett ansvar för att utforma, implementera och kommunicera UX-interaktion samt driva upplevelser av interaktions- och digital design för kundens tjänsteutbud & produkter.


Som UX Designer kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i skapandet av en avancerad analysdashboard som visualiserar potentialen i kundens AI-teknologier för övervakning av industriella maskiner! Vår kund strävar efter ökad automatisering på alla nivåer i utvecklingscykeln och du kommer att bidra till denna resa tillsammans med ditt team. Produkten du kommer att utveckla bidrar till modernare och smarta lösningar inom industrin.

  

Du kommer att arbeta nära data scientists och utvecklingsteamet för att säkerställa att användarupplevelsen är både funktionell och visuellt tilltalande. Vi strävar efter ökad automatisering på alla nivåer i utvecklingscykeln, och du kommer att bidra till denna resa tillsammans med ett energifyllt och socialt team.

### **Erbjudande**


Vi erbjuder en tillsvidareanställning där du initialt arbetar i ett långsiktigt projekt. Utöver detta erbjuder vi en skräddarsydd löne- och förmånsmodell som kan anpassas efter dina behov och önskemål. Vi är ett modernt konsultbolag med fokus på hållbarhet, flexibilitet och inkludering, och vi vill ge dig möjlighet att påverka och utvecklas tillsammans med oss.


Kunden har även ett intresse av en långsiktig lösning där du på sikt kan bli en del av deras bolag, inklusive möjlighet till optioner för rätt person.

### **Dina arbetsuppgifter**


Som UX Designer kommer du att:

* Designa, implementera och kommunicera UX-interaktion.
* Genomföra interaktions- och digital design för produkter.
* Samarbeta med data scientists och utvecklare för att designa och implementera avancerade produkter.
* Engagera dig med intressenter och kunder för att säkerställa en högkvalitativ UX i våra produkter.

### **Vi söker dig som**


Vi ser gärna att du har:

* **Flerårig praktisk erfarenhet i rollen som** UX-design och/eller Service Design
* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med ex **Figma**, Sketch eller andra relevanta verktyg
* Stark förståelse för både **användarupplevelse och gränssnittsdesign**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i tekniska miljöer och förståelse för frontend-utveckling
* Förmåga att arbeta iterativt och datadrivet, från research och koncept till testning och lansering
* En passion för att kombinera estetik och funktionalitet för att skapa engagerande digitala upplevelser
* Goda kommunikationsförmågor och flytande engelska

### **Om företaget**


Vår kund är en snabbväxande aktör som möjliggör industri 4.0 med lösningar inom AI! De hjälper tillgångsintensiva företag att förutse och förebygga kostsamma maskinstopp och prestandanedgångar i sina processer och tillgångar. Tillsammans engagerar de sig i ett ingenjörs- och produktfokuserat företag där kundens behov står i centrum. Ingenjörerna tar ledningen i att designa, utveckla och testa företagets produkter.

### **Övrig information**

* **Start:** Enligt överenskommelse
* **Placering:** Göteborg (hybrid/distans)
* **Kontakt:** Per Bleckberg, 072-245 92 88, per.bleckberg@weskill.se

Är du redo för nästa steg i din karriär? Skicka in din ansökan idag!

title: Design Internship
description:
**IMPORTANT:** 




 Stockholm Design Studio is an early-stage startup focused on creating world-class design experiences. While we cannot offer compensation or guaranteed future employment, we provide a valuable environment for learning, growth, and real-world experience to support your career goals. If your contributions significantly impact the studio's growth, we are open to discussing potential long-term collaboration after 4 months. However, we want to be transparent so that we cannot promise anything beyond that. Our priority is to help you develop your skills, build a strong portfolio, and connect with industry professionals. Join us only if this aligns with your aspirations.
 



  





**Job Title:** 
 Design Intern
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm (Remote or On-Site)
 



**Duration:** 
 4 months
 



  





**About Stockholm Design Studio:** 




 Stockholm Design Studio is an early-stage startup dedicated to creating world-class design experiences. We aim to push boundaries and build impactful, innovative designs that resonate with both our clients and users. As we grow, we are seeking passionate individuals who are eager to learn, contribute, and grow with us.
 



  





**Your Responsibilities** 




 🎨 Assist in
 **branding, UI/UX design, social media graphics, and motion design** 




 🖌️ Work with
 **senior designers, developers, and project managers** 
 on real-world projects
 



 📑 Support in
 **creating design learning materials** 
 (presentations, guides, templates)
 



 🖍️ Assist in
 **course content preparation** 
 for UI/UX, Graphic Design, and other creative topics
 



 🎭 Help with
 **designing promotional materials** 
 for Academy events & workshops
 



 💡 Contribute ideas for
 **improving learning resources** 
 for students
 



 📚 Stay updated with the
 **latest design trends** 
 and bring fresh ideas to the team
 



 🗣️ Be open to
 **critique, learn from experts, and refine your design skills** 




  





**What We’re Looking For** 




 🎨 Passionate designers eager to learn and grow
 



 📐 Basic skills in Figma, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD), or similar tools
 



 🔠 A strong eye for design, typography, and color theory
 



 💬 Good communication and teamwork skills
 



 🏆 Self-motivated and willing to take on creative challenges
 



  





**What We Offer:** 




  




* **Real-World Experience:** 
 Work on impactful projects that will contribute to your career growth.
* **Learning & Development:** 
 Access to mentorship from experienced professionals, learning opportunities in various design disciplines, and hands-on experience.
* **Portfolio Building:** 
 Opportunities to create a strong design portfolio that will impress future employers or clients.
* **Networking:** 
 Connect with industry professionals and gain exposure to the design community.



  





**What’s in it for you?** 




  




* Real-world experience working on
 **branding, UI/UX design, and digital projects**
* Mentorship from industry experts to sharpen your
 **design skills**
* A
 **Letter of Recommendation** 
 and
 **Experience Certificate** 
 upon successful completion
* The opportunity to
 **work on live projects** 
 and build a strong portfolio
* Insights into the
 **design industry, freelancing, and entrepreneurship**



  





**How to Apply:** 




 If you're passionate about design and eager to make an impact, we'd love to hear from you. Send your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining why you’re interested in joining Stockholm Design Studio and how this internship aligns with your goals.
 



  





**Interview Process** 




 📧
 **Step 1:** 
 Initial Email & Screening Call
 



 📝
 **Step 2:** 
 TestGorilla Assessment
 



 🎙️
 **Step 3:** 
 First Discussion – Introductions & Portfolio Review
 



 🎨
 **Step 4:** 
 Design Task & Presentation
 



 👥
 **Step 5:** 
 Final Discussion with Founders
 



 🤝
 **Step 6:** 
 Onboarding for Selected Candidates
 



  





**NOTE:** 




 This opportunity is on a first-come, first-served (FCFS) basis, and we may close applications as soon as we find the right candidate. We strongly encourage those who are available and ready to start immediately to apply, as this will significantly increase your chances in the selection process. We are looking for individuals who align with our vision and are eager to make an impact.

title: Final Art / Graphic Designer
description:
Are you passionate about bringing creative visions to life with perfect precision? Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment where global brands and innovative design meet? If so, this might be the perfect opportunity for you!
 



  





**About Us** 




 Cheil is a leading global agency network, recognized for shaping the success of Samsung — one of the world’s most influential technology brands. Since opening our Nordic office in Stockholm in 2013, we’ve been driving impactful marketing activities across the region.
 



  





**The Role** 




 As a Final Art Designer at Cheil Nordic, you’ll work closely with both the Creative and Retail teams finalizing graphic assets for Samsung. This may consist of either digital or print assets. Your work will primarily focus on retail marketing, ensuring brand consistency and high-quality content production across the Nordic markets. You’ll form an essential part of our Creative Group, collaborating across teams to deliver visual communications.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 




 • Produce final art for retail-focused, sales-driven campaigns.
 



 • Support colleagues by creating artwork to specification and deadlines.
 



 • Reformat pre-existing artworks to fit specific needs.
 



 • Export to a variety of print vendors and follow their print specifications.
 



 • Work to optimize production workflows.
 



 • Collaborate with your team to deliver according to expectation.
 



 • Manage image sourcing and processing.
 



 • Ensure top-tier quality and seamless communication with clients and partners.
 



 • Bonus if you have SoMe experience!
 



  





**What You’ll Bring** 




 • A degree in Graphic Design or a related field.
 



 • 2–3 years of experience of graphic production.
 



 • Mastery of Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
 



 • A keen eye for detail, composition, colour, and typography.
 



 • Strong organizational skills and the ability to create accurate print-ready files.
 



  





**Why Join Us?** 




 • Work with a globally recognized brand in an inspiring creative environment.
 



 • Be part of a dynamic, collaborative team with a passion for innovation.
 



 • Develop your skills in a fast-moving, technology-driven industry.
 



  





**Application** 




 If this sounds like your next challenge, we’d love to see your portfolio and CV!
 


* Apply now: m.wannerberg@cheil.com



  





**Formalities** 




 A valid work permit for Sweden is required, as we do not sponsor work permits. Additionally, priority will be given to candidates who are currently located in the Stockholm area or reside within a one-hour commute, as this position necessitates in-office presence for effective collaboration and creativity.
 



  





**Disclaimer** 




 We are managing this hiring process internally and kindly request that external recruitment partners refrain from contacting us.

title: Product Designer (Web)
description:
*Natural Cycles° is a leading women’s health company that developed the world’s first birth control app, used by millions globally. We are a fast growing startup, and we promote an international working environment filled with smart and ambitious colleagues based in Stockholm, Geneva, New York, and remotely. Our mission is to pioneer women’s health through research and passion, empowering every woman with the knowledge she needs to take charge of her health.* 




  





**Join our web team and design compelling web experiences that convert:** 




  





 We're looking for a talented and driven Product Designer to join our Web team, focusing on web design and optimizing conversion rate. You'll play a crucial role in shaping the user journey, particularly in optimizing our website and sign up flow from awareness to sign-up. Your work will directly impact how new users discover and engage with Natural Cycles.
 



  





 By joining our team, you’ll get the opportunity to collaborate on a variety of projects with a team of top product designers, product managers, and engineers in a fast-paced, rapidly growing, hybrid (technology/operations) environment. You’ll work on big, strategic projects as well as short, iterative A/B tests where you’ll get to see the impact of your work right away.
 



  





 If you’re passionate about web design and designing user-centered experiences that drive growth, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and want to make a real difference in women's health, we want to hear from you!
 



  





 Please note that we are hiring for this role in Sweden.
 



  





**What You'll Do:** 



* **Design for web & acquisition flows:** 
 Create and optimize web-based acquisition funnels, including web pages, signup flows, and purchase funnels.
* **Drive growth through design:** 
 Collaborate cross functional teams to design and A/B test web elements, focusing on key metrics like lead generation and conversion rates.
* **End-to-end design process:** 
 From initial concepts and user journey mapping to wireframing and high-fidelity mockups, you'll manage the full design lifecycle.
* **Data-driven design:** 
 Use qualitative and quantitative data to inform design decisions, validate hypotheses, and measure impact.
* **Cross-functional collaboration:** 
 Work closely with product managers, engineers, marketers, and other designers in an agile environment. Contribute to our design system, brand and broader design initiatives.



  





**What We're Looking For:** 



* **Minimum 2 years of design experience** 
 as a product designer for web, with a proven track record in designing consumer-focused web products, especially for mobile.
* **Growth mindset:** 
 Understanding of marketing strategies and user psychology, and a passion for driving user acquisition through design.
* **Visual design expertise:** 
 Strong visual design skills with strong UI/UX capabilities and proficiency in Figma.
* **Data-driven approach:** 
 Proficiency in using data to inform design decisions and measure impact.
* **Communication & collaboration:** 
 Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to articulate ideas and thrive in a team environment.
* **Self-motivation & curiosity:** 
 A self-driven and curious individual, eager to learn and tackle a variety of tasks. Thrives in a fast paced, agile work environment.
* **Portfolio:** 
 A portfolio demonstrating your design process, problem-solving skills, and successful web design projects.



  





**Nice-to-Haves:** 



* Experience with conversion funnels (e.g. signup quizzes, purchase funnels)
* Experience in A/B testing
* Familiarity with user research and usability testing
* Knowledge of Design Systems
* Critical thinking skills, and a willingness to challenge assumptions



  





**Benefits of joining Natural Cycles:** 



* Collaborate on impactful projects with a team of top product designers, product managers, and engineers, promoting continuous growth and skill enhancement.
* Work in a fast-paced, rapidly growing environment where you'll see the impact of your work immediately.
* Contribute to a mission-driven company that is revolutionizing women's health.
* Enjoy a remote first work model with flexibility & great benefits.



  





**Location** 




 We are remote-friendly, but we find great value in being able to connect with our teams in person. Most of the
 *Product Growth development* 
 team you will work with is located in Stockholm. Not living in Sweden? No problem! We offer relocation support to help you move
 **.** 




  





**Sounds interesting?** 




 If you want to be part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to hearing from you!
 



  





  





**How to apply** 




 To apply, just upload your CV and answer the questions on the application form. Keep in mind that we can't accept applications through email because of GDPR, and only applications submitted via the career site (and in English) will be considered.
 



 At Natural Cycles we value diversity and inclusion because we know that teams with people from different backgrounds and experiences are stronger. We welcome candidates from all walks of life and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.
 



  





**Note: We are not looking for consultants or help from recruitment agencies**

title: Senior Product Designer
description:
Are you prepared to lead the change in transforming the parking and EV charging space within an entrepreneurial and international environment? At EasyPark, we're on a mission to make cities more liveable, and we want you to be a key player in this journey.
 



 As a Senior Product Designer, you'll be an integral part of our team of customer-facing designers working across cross-functional teams, specifically, you will be part of our core team in charge of the entire payment experience for B2C and B2B customers using our app. Our mission is to provide our drivers with an intuitive, quick, and seamless payment experience so they can confidently go about their day.
 



 Product design is essential in reaching our goal. Our design team, currently consisting of 22 members, also aspires to broaden EasyPark's offerings into new markets. This presents significant potential to improve user experience and contribute to substantial business impact.
 



 The broader Product and Technology organization includes a genuinely diverse and distributed team of over 450 talented specialists in product, engineering, design, and analytics; located across Stockholm, Amsterdam, Basingstoke, Tallinn, Atlanta, and more.
 



**What you will be doing** 




 As a Senior Product Designer at EasyPark, you'll collaborate with a cross-functional team to deliver products and features for our +30 million monthly active users. Take ownership, make a significant impact, and contribute to the team's success by employing solid work methodologies and exceptional craft skills.
 



 Your daily tasks include hands-on work, defining customer flows, validating concepts, and creating mockups and prototypes. Actively engage in meetings and workshops with collaborators and stakeholders, taking on a facilitating role. Bring a proactive outlook to prioritize user-centric perspectives and identify additional opportunities based on insights or trends.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Independently lead end-to-end initiatives throughout the design process.
* Define patterns and design requirements for our B2C apps on IOS and Android.
* Collaborate cross-functionally, managing expectations and communications.
* Identify opportunities and define success metrics for your deliveries.
* Contribute to design systems and local libraries in collaboration with the Design System team.
* Advocate for design and user-centric perspectives in daily work.
* Ensure we’re shipping top-quality, impactful solutions that successfully balance business and user needs.
* Advocate and practice Accessibility best practices in your daily work.
* Balance exploration of new directions in user experience with incremental improvements.
* Proactively define and lead research projects, utilizing data, insights, and user research to drive daily activities, and collaborate as necessary.
* Represent design and user perspectives in high-level discussions with key stakeholders.



**Key Qualifications:** 



* A solid background with over 6 years in Digital Product Design.
* Proven experience in collaborating within cross-functional teams, especially in a B2C/SaaS setting.
* Effective written and verbal communication abilities.
* Leadership skills in guiding design decisions within your team.
* Demonstrated success in product-focused, outcome-driven, and high-quality shipped products.
* Proficient in Figma with strong design craft skills; expert at using various design tools for prototyping and animations.
* Capability to integrate UX research, UX writing, motion design, and design systems seamlessly at key stages in the design process.



**We expect you to share an outstanding portfolio, giving a sense of your track record of shipping excellent products.** 




**Location** 
 : This role is hybride-remote setup. Open to all in the EU and UK, with a primary focus on Łódź (PL), Amsterdam (NL), Basingstoke (UK), and Stockholm (SWE).
 



**Life at EasyPark Group** 




 We are a values-driven company with an international culture and a global presence. By providing an environment with space to grow and room for autonomy, we believe in encouraging and supporting our team members to take initiatives and act outside of their comfort zone. To have an open mind and embracing change is a part of our DNA. At EasyPark we are dedicated to maintaining an open culture where the voice of each person is heard, and we play as one team across the globe. Diversity is something we celebrate and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.
 



**What we offer** 



* Flexible ways of working: combine working from home with working from the office, whatever is agreed on within your team.
* Digital global onboarding: three days to indulge in learning & connecting with fellow new starters across the globe.
* Pension, insurance & health reimbursement: A competitive pension, in combination with the basic package of insurance.
* Proactive health support: your wellbeing is important to us, which is why we offer proactive medical support, all depending on your need.
* Work for an award winning company: for three years in a row (2019, -20, -21) EasyPark was awarded Sweden’s Best Managed Companies by Deloitte.
* And more depending on your location.

title: Senior Designer
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us— and let the world feel your work.**
 As a
 **Senior Designer** 
 at Epidemic Sound, you will play a pivotal role in designing and executing creative concepts across various platforms. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to deliver visually impactful design solutions from concept to final production.
   

  

**Your Key Responsibilities Include**
* Leading the development and execution of design concepts across digital, print, and experiential media.
* Collaborating with internal teams to understand project goals and ensure designs
* align with creative vision and business objectives.
* Managing design projects from start to finish, overseeing timelines and production.
* Providing mentorship and guidance to junior designers and third-party producers.
* Acting as a brand advocate, ensuring all designs reflect Epidemic Sound’s visual identity.


**Requirements**
* 5+ years of relevant experience.
* Portfolio showcasing a wide range of design skills.
* Working experience within the Adobe Suite.
* Strong aptitude in design principles (form, color, typography, layout).
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
* Proactive and solution-oriented approach.
* Strong attention to detail and a passion for design excellence.


**Equal opportunity employer**
 We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.
   

  

**Application**
 Ready to make the world feel your work? Please apply, in English, by clicking the link “interested” below.

title: Content Designer
description:
Är du en kreativ och formstark designer som brinner för att skapa visuellt innehåll? På NoA Elevate söker vi nu en Content Designer som vill vara med och lyfta varumärken genom pricksäker design och digitala lösningar!
 



  





**Om NoA Elevate** 




 NoA Elevate är en content- och produktionsbyrå. Vi skapar kanalanpassad reklam och högkvalitativt content – content som är i linje med varumärkeskoncept och levererar resultat. Vi är en effektiv produktionsapparat som maximerar marknadsföringen genom film och foto, rörlig grafik, copywriting, storytelling, art direction, projekt- och produktionsledning samt strategi.
 



  





 NoA Elevate är en del av The North Alliance – ett av Skandinaviens största byrånätverk där data & tech kombineras med strategi och kreativitet. Vi tror att kreativitet och teknik måste samverka för att skapa stark tillväxt, och därför bygger en stor del av vårt arbete på samarbete mellan våra byråer.
 



  





**Om rollen:** 




 Som Content Designer hos NoA Elevate ansvarar du för att skapa och anpassa visuellt innehåll som engagerar och stärker varumärkesnärvaro. Du ser till att designen är optimerad för olika digitala plattformar och att varje leverans håller en stark visuell standard. Rollen innefattar ett kreativt ansvar där du är en visuell berättare som omvandlar idéer till engagerande design anpassad för digitala kanaler.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:** 



* Skapa visuellt innehåll – Designa material som driver resultat och förstärker varumärken.
* Plattformsanpassning – Skräddarsy innehåll optimerat för specifika prestationskanaler och mål.
* Effektivisering – Använda verktyg som Figma, Smartly och Bannerflow för att optimera produktion.
* Samarbete – Arbeta nära kunder och team för att skapa dynamiskt och genomtänkt innehåll.
* Trendspaning – Hålla dig uppdaterad på de senaste trenderna inom design, motion graphics och AI-automatisering.



  





**Vem vi söker:** 




 Vi söker en noggrann, formsäker och kreativ Content Designer som brinner för digital design och har en skarp blick för detaljer. Du trivs i en dynamisk miljö där estetik och strategi går hand i hand, och du har en förmåga att omsätta idéer till visuellt engagerande material.
 



  





 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du:
 


* Har gedigen erfarenhet av grafisk design, särskilt inom digitala annonsformat.
* Behärskar layout och GRID-system och vet hur man skapar balanserade och visuellt tilltalande kompositioner.
* Har en stark känsla för typografi och färgsättning och förstår hur de påverkar en varumärkesidentitet.
* Är detaljorienterad, med ett öga för precision och estetisk perfektion.
* Har en förmåga att hantera flera projekt samtidigt och hålla deadlines.
* Har en proaktiv och lösningsorienterad inställning.



  





**Vi erbjuder:** 




 Hos NoA Elevate får du möjlighet att utvecklas i en dynamisk och inspirerande miljö där kreativitet och teknik går hand i hand. Vi är ett sammansvetsat team som stöttar varandra och delar passionen för rörlig bild och innehållsskapande.
 



  





 Skicka in din ansökan tillsammans med exempel från din portfolio och visa oss vad du kan skapa. Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.

title: User Experience Researcher (Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. Our aim is to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you’re looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
 UX Researchers own end-to-end planning, execution, analysis and reporting of research projects, and consistently achieve research outputs needed by Product teams to inform strategic decisions. The research findings of UX Researchers impact Agoda’s business success by informing Product teams regarding design or design process, end user experience, product direction, market strategy or similar.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Master Degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Human Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field
* 7+ years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains
* You are very comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research
* Experience with Qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Experience with Quantitative research (metrics, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data
* You are able to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* You are a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, designers, engineers and other stakeholders (in English)
* You enjoy collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven and creative environment


**Responsibilities:**
 General Role Expectations:
   

  

* Demonstrates critical thinking beyond explicit business requests
* Functions independently in all operational research tasks
* Leads core end-to-end research activities – including driving research objectives, hypotheses, methodology, execution, analysis, and communication


 Research Skills:
   

  

* Good judgement when evaluating research opportunities, e.g. importance, urgency, and impact for team
* Ability to reasonably challenge details of research requests, and propose solid research solutions
* Strong project execution with existing skills while constantly expanding his/her breadth and depth of abilities.
* Knowledge of approaches for both quantitative and qualitative research, effectively triangulating findings, methods, and theories with others.
* Application of tools and inspection methods to quantify the value and efficiency of research
* Ability to adopt and adapt well-established methods according to product/project situations, and innovate new methods in collaboration with more senior researchers
* Knowledge of or ability to quickly learn key software tools common in the field (e.g. for surveys, diary studies, analysis)
* Knowledge of data compliance and ethics in all of their activities


 Collaboration & Collaboration:
   

  

* Drives cross-discipline/department collaboration via research insights/activities.
* Collaborates efficiently with other researchers and other disciplines, with clear commitments in case of shared ownership.
* Demonstrates excellent communication skills; tailors communication style for different audiences, concise and to the point, open to taking input and feedback


 Research Community Contributions:
   

  

* Contributes to the research community in one or more ways – sharing work/ methodologies, coaching and/or mentoring other core or junior researchers, screening of Research candidates

title: Strategic Senior UX Researcher
description:
**Oneflow is a rapidly growing tech scale-up located in the heart of Stockholm. We have created a platform that automates the entire contract process from start to finish, all in one place. Turning clunky, static contracts into customer-oriented, digital contracts that feel like magic.** 




  





**About the role:** 




  





 We’re looking for a Strategic Senior UXR to connect user-centered research with strategic decision-making at Oneflow while empowering the organisation and product teams to further embed data-driven and user-centered approaches into their processes. You’ll play a critical role in uncovering actionable insights that influence both how we improve our product (tactically) and where we should focus for future growth (strategically). You’ll collaborate closely with UX Designers, Product Managers, Analytics, and the Strategy team to provide actionable insights that inform and support the product vision and strategy, ensuring alignment with user needs, market trends, and business goals.
 



  





 This is a high-impact role for someone who thrives on connecting research to strategy and is eager to shape the future direction of our products while ensuring we’re solving the right problems for our users.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 




  





 1. Tactical Research: Building the Product Right
 



 - Lead qualitative and quantitative research activities, including user interviews, usability testing, surveys, and data analysis.
 



 - Collaborate with our Product Trio’s to prioritise problems to solve, validate solutions through iterative testing, and connect user insights with market opportunities.
 



 - Mentor core team members in research best practices, empowering and supporting UX Designers and PMs by fostering a research-driven culture across the organisation.
 



  





 2. Strategic Research: Building the Right Product
 



 - Collaborate with the Strategy and Analytics teams to conduct market research, analyse quantitative data, and uncover trends and growth opportunities.
 



 - Integrate user research with market and quantitative insights to create a shared understanding of customer needs, business opportunities, and the competitive landscape.
 



 - Explore and validate strategic opportunities by combining customer insights with market dynamics and data-driven findings.
 



  





 3. Cross-Functional Collaboration and Influence
 



 - Act as a bridge between UX, PMs, Engineering, Analytics and Strategy teams, ensuring a unified approach to gathering and leveraging insights.
 



 - Present research findings and strategic recommendations to leadership and cross-functional teams, driving alignment around customer-centric priorities.
 



 - Facilitate for user-centered decision-making across the organisation, linking research insights to measurable business outcomes.
 



  





**Who You Are** 




  





 - An Expert Researcher: You have deep expertise in user research methods (qualitative and quantitative) and are adept at uncovering actionable insights that inform both tactical decisions and strategic direction.
 



 - A Strategic Thinker: You understand the broader context of product and business strategy, including market research, growth opportunities, and competitive dynamics.
 



 - A Collaborative Partner: You thrive in cross-functional environments, working closely with PMs, UX, Engineering, Analytics and Strategy teams to align insights with goals and drive shared success.
 



 - An Engaging Communicator and Storyteller: You excel at articulating complex findings clearly and effectively, using compelling narratives to inspire action and ensure research insights resonate across diverse audiences.
 



 - A Mentor and Advocate: You enjoy mentoring others in research methodologies, championing user-centric thinking, and fostering collaboration across teams.
 



  





**We Believe You Have** 




  





 - 5+ years of experience in user research, product insights, or a related role, preferably in B2B SaaS environments.
 



 - Expertise in a range of research methods, including interviews, usability testing, surveys, and competitive analysis.
 



 - Familiarity with market research and analytics tools, and an understanding of how to combine qualitative and quantitative data.
 



 - A proven track record of influencing product and business strategies through research.
 



 - Excellent communication and facilitation skills, with experience presenting to senior leadership.
 



  





**The Impact You’ll Make** 




  





 - Deliver research that drives measurable improvements in the product and aligns with user and business needs.
 



 - Foster a culture of curiosity and continuous learning by mentoring team members in research methodologies.
 



 - Contribute to defining and refining Oneflow’s research practices, ensuring we deliver exceptional user experiences while meeting strategic objectives.
 



 - Contribute to shape Oneflow’s product strategy by combining user insights, market trends, and growth opportunities.
 



 - Bridge the gap between tactical UX research and strategic decision-making, creating a more research-driven organisation.
 



  





**Work location** 




  





 This position is based at our Stockholm office. Remote arrangements are not available for this role.
 



  





**Come work with us** 




  





 We value gender equality and diversity in organisation, so we strive for a team that reflects the diversity in today's society. At Oneflow we currently have 34 nationalities and are proud of an extremely diverse workplace. Our recruitment is based on competence.
 



 The recruitment process starts with an interview with Aleksandra from the Talent Acquisition team. Next, you will complete a personality and logic test, followed by an assignment, and then participate in the case interview.
 



  





**We can’t wait to meet you! 🎉** 




  





 Visit our website for more information about our product and Oneflow. Visit our career page for more information about our culture and future colleagues. 💜

title: Webbredaktör
description:
Älskar du att skapa skarp, relevant och engagerande webbkommunikation? Vill du vara en del av ett team som ständigt utvecklar och förbättrar en av Sveriges viktigaste webbplatser? Då kan webbredaktör hos Unionen vara jobbet för dig!
 



  





**Ditt uppdrag** 




 Som webbredaktör hos Unionen blir du en nyckelspelare i vår webbgrupp, där du ser till att innehållet på unionen.se är relevant, användarvänligt och värdefullt för våra förtroendevalda och medlemmar. Du kommer att samarbeta med kommunikatörer inom sektionen - tillsammans förvaltar och vidareutvecklar ni webbplatsen – alltid med fokus på att möta besökarnas behov.
 



  





 Det här är ett lagarbete, där Unionens förvaltningsmodell och innehållsprocess är ledande verktyg för dig. Genom ett nära samarbete med sakkunniga kollegor som ansvarar för områdesexpertisen, ansvarar du för det kommunikativa anslaget på sidorna. Du kommer att:
 


* skapa och paketera innehåll på webben som gör skillnad – både för befintliga och blivande medlemmar
* förvalta och utveckla Unionens digitala kommunikation så att den är tydlig, tillgänglig och inspirerande
* göra UX-copy – skapa och optimera korta, effektiva texter
* analysera besöksmönster och använda insikterna för att förbättra användarupplevelsen
* jobba med bildhantering i Photoshop



  





**Vem söker vi?** 




 En kreativ, kommunikativ och lösningsorienterad doer, som gillar att jobba i team och som är lyhörd och bra på att skapa relationer.
 



 Du är en webbredaktör med flerårig erfarenhet och med mycket god vana av att bygga upp nytt målgruppsanpassat innehåll och webbsidor samt att strukturera och förpacka om befintligt material.
 



  





 Du har erfarenhet av webbredaktionellt arbete och en mycket god känsla för digital kommunikation. Du trivs i en förvaltande roll där struktur och processer ger trygghet, men där du också får utrymme att utveckla och förbättra. Du är nyfiken, kan analysera besöksmönster, har ett öga för detaljer – både i text och bild – och god kännedom om UX.
 



  





 Vi tror att du:
 


* är strukturerad och tycker att förvaltning och optimering är två väldigt fina ord
* är van vid att skriva för webben och att förpacka om omfattande texter till tillgängliga, användarcentrerade och förståeliga texter, utan att på vägen tappa kärnbudskapet
* utforskar och använder AI med nyfikenhet och ser dess potential att utveckla informationsstrukturer och påverka hur vi människor kommunicerar
* tänker att innehåll och teknik behöver gå hand i hand
* är mycket noggrann i hur du skriver och är pålitlig i dina leveranser
* har förmåga att tänka nytt med det fackliga perspektivet som utgångspunkt
* har en stor egen drivkraft och förmåga att utefter satta ramar leda dig själv. Därtill har du god förmåga att arbeta självständigt, att ta egna initiativ och att driva egna frågor
* är flexibel och öppen för andras idéer, synpunkter och värderingar och har lätt för att samspela med olika funktioner på en arbetsplats



  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* Minst 5 års relevant yrkeserfarenhet i roll som webbredaktör, digital kommunikatör, content manager, innehållsproducent eller liknande i en stor organisation.
* Högskoleutbildning inom digital kommunikation eller annan likvärdig utbildning.
* Kunskap om flera CMS.
* Vana av att arbeta med SEO- och analysverktyg (exempelvis Wincher, Ahrefs, GA4).
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift, samt en bra känsla för bild och form.



**Meriterande** 



* Kunskap om fackligt arbete, arbetsrätt och den svenska modellen eller tidigare arbete inom ett fackförbund.
* Erfarenhet av Drupal och Apsis.
* Kunskap om att spela in och klippa film för sociala medier.
* Förståelse av CRM, av värdekedja som metod/planeringsmodell och för flerkanalsstrategier.
* Du som webbredaktör ska vid behov även kunna vara behjälplig i annan digital kommunikation.



  





 Hos Unionen får du arbeta med en meningsfull uppgift, utvecklas inom digital kommunikation och vara en del av ett drivet och kompetent team.
 



  





**Omfattning** 




 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning, med tillträde enligt överenskommelse (provanställning kan komma att tillämpas). Månadslön och i övrigt goda villkor enligt kollektivavtal.
 



 Tjänsten är placerad på Unionens förbundskontor på Olof Palmes gata 17 i Stockholm inom Enheten för medlem, marknad och kommunikation. Kontoret är vår huvudsakliga arbetsplats, och visst arbete kan utföras från annan plats.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 24 mars 2025.
 



  





**Kontakt** 




 Vid frågor, kontakta sektionschef tomas.loven@unionen.se 08-504 151 43,
 



 eller facklig kontakt anna-karin.stockhaus@unionen.se 08-504 151 34

title: Design Engineer
description:
Are you the audacious
 **design engineer** 
  we’re searching for? We’re on a quest to assemble a crew of 
 **brilliantly unique thinkers** 
  and together embark on an odyssey poised to democratize marketing for small businesses. Join us as our first in-house engineer where you will spearhead our initative to rethink how the front-end user experience should look and feel.
 



  





**WHY IDELE?** 




 At Idele, we believe that in a post-AI world, every rule is up for debate. Here, the magic lies in knowing when to discard the rulebook and when to build on it. You’ll have the freedom to
 **challenge** 
 long-held UI/UX conventions using
 **AI** 
 and emerging
 **no/low-code technologies,** 
 you'll help build a
 **next-generation** 
 software platform that leverages tools like
 **Lovable** 
 and
 **n8n** 
 , while applying your 
 **high-code expertise** 
  to architect a truly functional system. This unique role offers a
 **rare opportunity** 
 to evolve from a traditional front-end engineer into a design engineer — using AI to empower development instead of solely writing code.
 



  





**INNOVATE** 




 Collaborate with a dynamic team to shape a human-first user interface and redefine development using cutting-edge, AI-enhanced no/low-code tools.
 



  





**GROW & EVOLVE** 




 Seize a rare learning opportunity at the bleeding edge of emerging technologies, expanding your skillset and shaping the future of efficient, impactful software solutions.
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 As our UI/UX spearheader, you'll transform our Lovable prototype into a captivating, user-friendly interface using
 **React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS** 
 . You'll be the go-to expert for turning ideas into engaging, fluid digital experiences that bring our platform to life.
 



  




* **DESIGN:** 
 Shape dynamic UIs with subtle interactions and thoughtful prompts to keep users delighted and engaged.
* **BUILD:** 
 Own and refine our front-end architecture, ensuring a clean, high-performance experience through both no/low-code and high-code approaches.
* **COLLABORATE:** 
 Work with designers, backend developers, and marketers to rapidly iterate and bring collective ideas to life.



  





**THE PROFILE** 




 We're seeking a frontend whiz who loves solving problems creatively and values both pixel-perfect design and clean, maintainable code. Who embraces the dynamic nature of an early startup with enthusiasm and resilience. 
 



  




* Keen to turn challenges into opportunities, transforming ideas into impactful solutions.
* Passionate about designing seamless, intuitive user experiences with a strong attention to detail.
* Driven by a genuine curiosity and a relentless desire to learn and evolve.
* Naturally collaborative, appreciating diverse perspectives and working well in agile, cross-functional teams.
* Steadfast in your approach, ready to fully invest your skills and energy in shaping the future of our platform.



  





**THE SKILLSET** 




 We're seeking a candidate with a strong foundation in frontend development and UI/UX design who can build complex, engaging UI components and systems. You should have a solid grasp of web fundamentals—from HTTP to CSS—and be proficient in modern technologies.
 



  




* Broad experience with
 **React, TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS** 
 .
* Proficiency within UI/UX Design and Principles.
* Demonstrated ability to build complex UI components and scalable systems.
* Deep understanding of web fundamentals, including
 **HTTP, CSS** 
 , and responsive design.
* Ability to build custom components that extend a no/low-code foundation as needed.
* A keen eye for performance, accessibility, and maintaining clean, maintainable code.



  





**Want more information?** 




**Check out our careers page:** 

 https://idele.com/careers
 




**or apply directly on our website:** 

 https://idele.com/careers/design-engineer/

title: Sales Lead Merkle Sweden
description:
**Job Description:**
 Merkle is a full-service, data-driven customer experience transformation agency, we partner with Top 500 companies in the Northern European region. Our Merkle NE cluster consists of four markets: Sweden, Norway, Denmark, and the Netherlands, and we operate as one unified, leading full-service digital agency to serve our Nordic markets.  Our 700+ digital enthusiasts are innovating the way brands are built by providing expertise in Digital Transformation strategy, MarTech platforms, Creativity, UX, CRM, Data, Commerce, and CMS. Merkle is a part of dentsu, a global network of over 66,000 passionate individuals in 146 countries.
   

  

  

  

**Being a Sales Lead at Merkle:**
 As a Sales Lead with 5+ years of experience, you are a key person for the growth and sustainable development of our new logo sales pipeline. Working closely with our marketing and wider sales teams, you will open the door to net new logo accounts in Sweden, contribute to our marketing efforts (events & campaigns) and proactively seek new services clients through your own outreach and network.
   

  

 You will help Merkle sell more efficiently and effectively and understand the prospective client decision-making process and organisational map. Thanks to your proactive way of approaching people, you will have no inhibitions about making the first telephone contact and getting into a conversation and following up on qualified leads into Merkle or via BDR/Executive engagement. With a curious mind, it is also easy for you to understand customer needs and to align these to the services Merkle can deliver, using business outcomes & ROI insights as a primary conversation point.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Primary objective: Net New Logo lead generation through Alliance partner source, network, own outreach and supporting Merkle related marketing/BDR efforts
* Meet annual individual sales quota
* Develops accurate, high-quality leads into Merkle’s pre-sales team aligned to the company’s sales process.
* Ensure sales tools and documentation are up-to-date on live opportunities to enable accurate pipeline tracking
* Develops close working relationship with Merkle Growth team and marketing to develop outreach campaigns to target clients/industry verticals aligned to Merkle sales motions
* Develop deep relationships and understanding across our Merkle practice areas and Alliance partner ecosystem
* Develops deep understanding of Merkle GTMs and case studies to become a trusted partner to Alliance partner Account Executive teams and trusted advisor to prospective clients.
* Manage relationships with Alliance partner account executives to drive Merkle propositions, campaigns and sales opportunities
* Develops unqualified leads into qualified opportunities, adhering to standard opportunity management process leveraging sales tools
* Originates new client and cross/up-sell opportunities for proactive proposals and find new RFI and RFP opportunities for Merkle.
* Analyses prospective client business goals, objectives, needs, process and existing infrastructure to propose Merkle solutions proactively.
* Applies business outcome-based sales principles and demonstrates relevant and transferable company experience in developing sales, with a clear understanding of the next steps required to propose projects that are realistic in terms of timelines, budgets, and other critical factors


**Key Activities:**
* Manage the sales pipeline and forecasting accuracy
* Ownership of processing Alliance partner sourced or personally sourced RFI and RFPs related to assigned vertical straight into the sales process or into a qualification process deal, owning associated documentation and running of those activities in line with best practices
* Specific Go-To-Market Salesforce propositions.
* Identifying the right prospects based on industry vertical assigned, funding rounds, open tenders/RFPs and other triggers.
* Tracking the movement of decision-makers through organisations that are aligned to Merkle based solutions.
* Analysing and mapping our competitors’ customer landscape and understand our win-themes as Merkle.
* Sourcing new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound efforts on LinkedIn, email, call, etc
* Represent the face of Merkle through the first customer touch point
* Understanding customer needs and requirements to qualify leads
* Accumulate the latest trends and developments in Marketing technology and the digital marketing industry in general through an inquisitive and self-motivated approach
* Nurturing the engaged leads through engaging and curated content relevant to the prospects’ business needs and our offerings


**What you’ll bring:**
* Anticipated the appropriate candidate will have minimum 3-5 years business development/consultative sales experience in the digital/CX agency, CRM and/or commerce technology space.
* Background in marketing technology, professional services or digital agency (Experience of any of Salesforce, Adobe, Optimizely, Braze, CRM, commerce, marketing automation, CDP’s, or CX desirable)
* Knowledge of the inner workings of software alliance partnerships a big plus
* Experience in end-to-end sales lead qualification – MQL to SQL, Inbound/Outbound, marketing campaigns & Events
* Strong ability to do research in a commercial environment through tools such as LinkedIn Sales Navigator and ZoomInfo
* Able to take full ownership of a lead generation/qualification process
* History of success working within an individual and team environment
* Self-starter with the ability to think quickly and adapt to client needs
* Must have a history of quota attainment
* Viewed as a thought leader in sales and well connected/networked
* Exceptional communications and presentation skills
* Ability to lead through influence over authority
* Strong collaboration capabilities are critical to this role
* A team player with a strong, confident personality and a positive attitude with great dedication
* Highly motivated, well-organized and driven


**What you’ll bring:**
* Anticipated the appropriate candidate will have minimum 3-5 years business development/consultative sales experience in the digital/CX agency, CRM and/or commerce technology space.
* Background in marketing technology, professional services or digital agency (Experience of any of Salesforce, Adobe, Braze, CRM, commerce, marketing automation, CDP’s, or CX desirable)
* Knowledge of the inner workings of software alliance partnerships a big plus
* Experience in end-to-end sales lead qualification – MQL to SQL, Inbound/Outbound, marketing campaigns & Events
* Strong ability to do research in a commercial environment through tools such as LinkedIn Sales Navigator and ZoomInfo
* Able to take full ownership of a lead generation/qualification process
* History of success working within an individual and team environment
* Self-starter with the ability to think quickly and adapt to client needs
* Must have a history of quota attainment
* Viewed as a thought leader in sales and well connected/networked
* Exceptional communications and presentation skills
* Ability to lead through influence over authority
* Strong collaboration capabilities are critical to this role
* A team player with a strong, confident personality and a positive attitude with great dedication
* Highly motivated, well-organized and driven


**We offer, among other things:**
* Collective agreement
* 5000 SEK in wellness allowance
* 30 days of vacation
* Flexibility and the best possible mix of two good things, working at our offices and working from home
* Many career and development opportunities


**Application:**
 Is your heart racing a little now? If you can see yourself in all this – both the job and being part of Merkle – we would love to hear from you.   The position is full-time with permanent employment and is located at our Stockholm office. There is no application deadline; finding the right candidate is more important to us than a fast process. The job ad will be removed after filling the position.
   

  

**Location:**
 Stockholm
   

  

**Brand:**
 Merkle
   

  

**Time Type:**
 Full time
   

  

**Contract Type:**
 Permanent

title: Senior Quantitative User Experience Researcher (Frontend) (Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**We have only scratched the surface.** 
 The online travel industry is an extremely dynamic and competitive space. We aim to deliver compelling designs that create a world-class customer experience. You will have a key role in defining the future of our products that reach millions of customers. Despite our size, we operate in a startup-like environment.
   

  

**Work in the heart of Asia.** 
 This is an amazing opportunity if you’re looking for an exciting adventure abroad while expanding your international research capabilities. You get a chance to live in one of the most beautiful and most visited cities in the world!
   

  

**This position is open to worldwide candidates and we will assist you with a generous relocation package, ensuring a smooth transition to working and living in Bangkok.**
 Senior UX Researchers have the breadth and depth of research method skills applicable to a wide range of questions, and over time develop standout areas of research excellence. A long track record and documented success in both research itself and achieving organizational impact is characteristic of Senior UX Researchers. The ability to integrate research into the work of colleagues in other roles makes the Senior UX Researcher effective and helps him/her achieve out-sized impact from research efforts. This ability, along with others that turn research into a strategic asset for Agoda’s decisions and processes, comes from a maturity in overall research approach emphasizing the highest benefit from all research investments.
   

  

**Qualifications:**
* Masters Degree or PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Information Science, Psychology, Social Science, or any related field
* 10+ years of relevant experience in consumer-facing business domains.
* Expert in Quantitative research. (Log analysis, internal metrics triangulation, survey design, response effects, sampling, crosstabs, and statistical concepts, etc.)
* But, also has experience with Qualitative and user-centered design methods (individual and group interviews, diary studies, direct observation, think-aloud usability testing, etc.)
* Comfortable with planning, scoping, conducting, analyzing and communicating research.
* Experience in evaluating, negotiating, and working with external research vendors.
* Be able to describe user problems and business opportunities to a variety of stakeholders by leveraging both quantitative and qualitative data.
* Ability to demonstrate critical thinking beyond business requests
* Is a great storyteller and communicator, able to speak fluently to business people, product teams, designers, engineers, and other stakeholders. (in English)
* Enjoys collaborative work in a dynamic, data-driven, and creative environment.


**Responsibilities:**
 General Role Expectations:
   

  

* Conducts research end-to-end for high impact, leading stakeholders to the best collaboration with research for their goals
* Initiates research efforts serving Product Vertical goals in the medium- and long-term given a well-informed understanding of the business
* Formulates programmes of study and cumulative knowledge sharing relevant to the strategic objectives of their teams
* Leads projects that are collaborations with other stakeholders
* Accounts for the pros and cons of various research methodologies, and mentors others the use of techniques and tools for high-quality execution


 Research Skills:
   

  

* Expertise at evaluating research opportunities, particularly with ambiguous requests e.g. importance, urgency, and impact
* Ability to manage, challenge and shape inbound research requests, and propose solid research projects or programs
* Excellent project execution, while exploring alternate methods, mixed methods and innovative approaches
* Deep understands of the pros and cons of quantitative and qualitative research – and use of this knowledge to direct projects to appropriate methods
* Deep expertise in at least one domain (eg. Pricing), a user type (eg. Business traveler) or a method (eg. Diary Study), being the “go-to person” on the research team for this
* Triangulation of findings, methods, and theories within a project to ensure reliability and depth of insight
* Ability to maximize the value and efficiency of research by applying secondary research and expert inspection methods
* Solid knowledge of various software tools common in the field (e.g. for surveys, diary studies, analysis), and ability to apply the right tool to the problem
* Solid knowledge of GDPR, data compliance and ethics that is present in all of their activities


 Communication & Collaboration:
   

  

* Drives cross discipline/department collaboration via research insights/activities
* Collaborates efficiently with other researchers and other disciplines with clear commitment to shared ownership
* Shows excellent communication skills; tailored communication style for different audiences, concise and to the point, open to take input and feedback
* Contributes to the communication and implementation of agreed standards of research excellence across the organization
