title: RCE TSM Assistant
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About our unit**


RAN Software & Compute Platforms Engineering (RCE) is a new unit with end-to-end responsibilities for software and compute, focusing on next-gen development for open and cloud-native RAN software. With high-performing programmable networks, enabled by openness and cloud, the unit will help Ericsson to maintain technology leadership.


Business Operations and Program Office seeks to drive that RCE has the best people, the best practices and operating model, to deliver the best product that meets our customers' needs through quality focused execution within our portfolio financial investments.

**About this opportunity**


As an Assistant in BNEW RCE TSM you will be given the opportunity to be an important player in driving our unit’s success. You will also work with the RCE BNEW R&D Security unit and SW transformation leader. You will do this by using your passion for support and advice to help ensure productivity and efficiency for leaders and teams. Your professionalism, adaptability, and confidence will be instrumental to making the unit a great place to work.


We are now looking for an Assistant to provide a high degree of administrative support and service to managers, unit leadership teams and where applicable to unit members. Assistants may in some cases take decisions on behalf of their manager and represent the unit if delegated. Further, contribute to and coordinate activities in different projects in the administrative area, act as expert for the administrative support systems whenever needed and authorize orders, invoices in line with authorization policies and routines. Support and advise about Ericsson internal administrative processes, systems, and tools. The tasks performed can be on an ad-hoc basis. All above to optimize administrative efficiency, meet business needs and enable the line organization to focus on the core business.

 **What you will do**

* Manage information and support in creating information
* Support with use of Ericsson administrative tools & other general tools
* Support with travel arrangements
* Handle entry and exit administration
* Support management
* Drive improvement and implementation of administrative routines
* Network and communicate with other assistants within and outside the organization
* Plan and coordinate internal and external events, meetings, workshops, trainings

 **The skills you bring**

* At least 5 -6 years of experience and University degree.
* MS Office (excel, power point, word), Outlook, Pdf file converter, SAP and conference equipment
* Proficient written and spoken English
* Service minded personality
* Excellent communication skills and enjoy working in a collaborative manner
* Dedicated, reliable and with a positive attitude
* Ability to learn, open and adaptable personality

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

 **Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: AWS Cloud Solutions Architect
description:
Redeploy is a powerhouse of cloud, data, and AI expertise. Our certified strategists, architects, developers, and engineers craft and implement cloud-native solutions, from the initial vision and strategy to developing, migrating, and managing cloud environments. Our teams across Sweden, Lithuania, and Poland assure enterprises of a comprehensive and integrated approach to their journey, focusing on reliable, secure, and efficient solutions. For more information, go to redeploy.com/about
   

  

**️** 
**About Redeploy Build**
 At Redeploy Build, we are cloud specialists. What we do is build and integrate best-in-breed cloud environments, steering clear of legacy constraints and “old-IT”.
   

  

 We help our clients within all areas of public cloud - from building, governing, migrating and optimizing our client’s cloud resources. Living by a “Cloud always, in all ways” motto, we always get things done and are not just another powerpoint-firm, rather getting our hands dirty and putting tech into practice. Learn more about us here.
   

  

 As a rapidly growing public cloud company, we understand that our success depends on the talents we choose to surround ourselves with. Now we are looking for an AWS Cloud Solutions Architect in Stockholm, Gothenburg or Jönköping who wants to be a part of our continued success story. Maybe it's you?
   

  

**What it means to work as a AWS Cloud Solutions Architect Consultant at Redeploy**
 As an AWS Cloud Solution Architect, you will be a crucial member of the team and hold a multifaceted role, assuming the responsibility of owning client relationships right from the project's inception to the finish line.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 From the initial dialogues with clients to project kick-off, this role demands a seasoned professional who can seamlessly transition from talking to product owners/management and take ownership of the design, architecture, and driving the technical delivery alongside the client and our skilled team. Your responsibilities will include following areas:
   

  

* Client Relationship Ownership: Establish and nurture relationships with clients, initiating crucial dialogues at the project's outset to gain a comprehensive understanding of their objectives and expectations.
* Design and Architecture Ownership: Take charge of the conceptualization and design phase, translating client requirements into robust and innovative AWS solutions.
* Technical Delivery Leadership: Drive the technical delivery process, collaborating closely with the team to ensure the seamless implementation of cloud solutions. Your expertise will be instrumental in achieving project milestones and exceeding client expectations. We also expect you to be hands on and code, deploy and document when needed.


**Who are you?**
 We believe that you have a passion for cloud architecture and that you enjoy creating value and solving problems for clients and businesses. You’re a natural leader and open-minded, positive, driven and a curious person who understands the power of team collaboration and sharing knowledge with others.
   

  

**What experiences do you bring?**
* Experience in leading complex large-scale projects, particularly with enterprise customers or large organizations.
* A solid understanding of business operations and dynamics, allowing you to align technical solutions with overarching business objectives.
* Advanced knowledge and hands-on experience with AWS is essential, with additional public clouds such as Azure and GCP considered advantageous.
* A strong background in development, engineering or technical roles including hands-on experience with conceptualizing, strategizing, designing and architecting cloud solutions.
* Knowledge and practical experience of programming and Dev(Sec)Ops and Platform Engineering.
* Sharing, coaching and mentoring your fellow colleagues and clients.
* Hands-on experience with IaC (Infrastructure-as-Code) with CloudFormation, CDK and/or terraform for example, version control systems (e.g., Git), and CI/CD pipelines.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.


**And** 
**if you come with following experiences, you will stick out from the crowd!**
* Well-Architected Framework, Landing Zones and Cloud Governance
* Container management and microservices such as Kubernetes, Docker and Openshift.
* Data and Analytics such as Databricks and Snowflake
* Developer Experience, Cloud Optimization, Machine Learning and FinOps framework.


*Even if you don’t perfectly match the role, we still encourage you to apply. We believe in diversity and inclusion and welcome all applicants with relevant experience and skills.*
**What We Offer**
 Being a member of Redeploy means you have the drive and desire to be the best and work smarter than the rest. We enjoy creative freedom with our projects, benefit from great work/life balance, and thrive in a company culture that is both collaborative and supportive. Everything we do at Redeploy is centered around the simple yet effective idea that we all chip in to ensure our success.
   

  

**To Learn More About Our Benefits, Scroll Down**
**Location**
 We have offices located in central Stockholm, Göteborg and Jönköping. As we encourage a mix of in-person and remote work to foster innovation and support work-life balance (and like to have fun together), we see that you are based in commuting distance to our office location.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 We hope that we have sparked your interest and that you are curious to know more about the role and us at Redeploy.
   

  

 We are constantly recruiting, so submit your application as soon as you can by hitting the apply button. To be compliant with GDPR, we only accept applications through our careers channel. Please submit your application using the form on our career website, or any website displaying a position with us.
   

  

 For any specific questions about the position, reach out to Talent Acquisition Manager Francisca Andersson.
   

  

 We look forward hearing from you!

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Delivery Excellence-team (Stockholm)
description:
**Company Description**
 Deloitte is a leading global provider of audit and assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax, and related services. During its 175-year history, our organization has grown tremendously in both scale and capabilities. Deloitte currently has approximately 457,000+ people in more than 150 countries and territories, and serves four out of five Fortune Global 500® companies. Yet, our shared culture and mission—to make an impact that matters—remains unchanged. This is evident not only in Deloitte’s work for clients, but also in our WorldClass ambition, our WorldClimate initiative and our ALL IN diversity and inclusion strategy.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**
 Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.
   

  

*We are looking to grow in the following areas: SAP Delivery Excellence, Project Manager, Business Manager, PMO, Project Manager, Delivery Manager, Process Manager, Test and Release Manager*
 As an experienced SAP professional, you will play a key role in driving SAP-enabled business transformation for both global enterprises and local Nordic companies. You will be involved in major SAP projects, working closely with clients to shape solutions from roadmap to post-go-live support, defining scope, planning, and ensuring successful delivery. Your responsibilities will include providing business insights, managing stakeholders, improving processes, identify needs and translating them to technical requirements and guiding leaders through digital transformation.
   

  

 You will enhance your people skills by collaborating with both onshore and offshore colleagues as part of a global team. Leveraging your SAP expertise, you will lead your team in delivering adapted solutions within budget and on time. By building strong client relationships, you will create value and drive long-term business growth.
   

  

 Additionally, you will have the opportunity to drive business development with new clients, applying your expertise to foster knowledge and talent growth.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 To succeed in these roles, you need a strategic mindset, strong customer focus, and experience with SAP solutions and digital transformation technologies, such as SAP S/4HANA Cloud. A deep understanding of customer needs, business processes, and organizational challenges is essential. You thrive in an international environment, have broad experience, are eager to learn, and work well in teams.
   

  

**Key qualifications include:**
 Experience in large-scale SAP transformation and implementation projects, while industry knowledge and subject matter expertise are valued.
   

  

**Further qualifications:**
* Completed master’s or bachelor’s degree.
* 3+ years of SAP experience across various functional areas
* 3+ years as a Project Manager
* Experience in a consulting environment and with project management methodologies such as Waterfall and Agile
* Hands-on experience with SAP modules; S/4HANA experience is a plus
* Strong leadership skills, with a track record of leading teams in projects and organizations
* Proven ability to manage client interactions, primarily in client-facing roles
* Understanding of end-to-end business processes, best practices, and industry trends
* Core consulting skills (advisory, strategy, presentation, problem-solving, coordination)
* Familiarity with project lifecycle phases (prepare, explore, realize, deploy)
* Experience as a Solution Architect, Project Manager, Functional/Process Consultant, Business Process Expert, Product Owner or similar
* Strong business expertise, problem-solving, and analytical skills
* Proficiency in English and Swedish (oral and written)
* Willingness to travel


 Additional Information
   

  

**We offer**
 At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
   

  

 Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
   

  

**Questions?**
 For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se.
   

  

*We are looking forward to your application!*
 For further information on Deloitte, please visit www.deloitte.se
   

  

**What impact will you make?**
 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: Vi söker vår nästa Teamchef inom Cloud (GCP/Azure)
description:
Ansök nu
   

  

* Urval sker löpande
* Hybrid


 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är en erfaren mjukvaruutvecklare och molnarkitekt
 **inom GCP** 
 eller
 **Azure** 
 med en passion för att bygga framtidssäkra lösningar och inspirera andra. I rollen kombinerar du arbete som konsult med en roll som teamchef, en roll där du hjälper både kunder och kollegor att bli framgångsrika. Cirka 20% av din tid roll innefattar att växa, inspirera och utveckla ditt team och verksamheten i södra Sverige tillsammans med övriga individer i den lokala ledningsgruppen. Resterande tid möjliggör du våra kunder att bli lyckosamma i sina molntransformationer på olika sätt! En roll för en multikonstnär med starkt självledarskap och erfarenhet av att leda team och leveranser.
   

  

**Forefront**
 Sedan 2008 har vi vuxit till över 550 kollegor med en mångfald av erfarenheter och kompetens inom managementkonsulting, design och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi finns på 11 kontor i Sverige och sedan 2024, även i USA.
   

  

 Vi strävar efter att bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats genom att uppskatta våra olikheter, ständigt blicka framåt och skapa en organisation som är lika modig som klok. Vår övertygelse är att tekniken ger oss oanade möjligheter – för att utveckla människor, skapa bättre affärer och bygga hållbara samhällen.
   

  

 Vi drivs av att förena människa och teknik och med gemensamma visioner och större ambitioner, stödjer vi en bred kundkrets på deras digitaliseringsresor. Genom våra nära partnerskap med Google och Microsoft ligger vi i teknisk framkant och erbjuder utmärkta förutsättningar för att hjälpa våra kunder med deras digitaliseringsprojekt.
   

  

**Dina Ansvarsområden**
* Designa och implementera skalbara, distribuerade och kvalitativa system som drar nytta av PaaS-tjänster och de unika fördelarna med hyperscalers som GCP och Azure. För att prata klarspråk, du hjälper och möjliggör kunder bli lyckosamma i deras nyttjande av en plattform under olika delar av en molntransformation.
* Säkerställa att våra kunder får rätt lösningar för just deras situation genom att dra nytta av din och vår insyn i Google och Microsofts tekniska utveckling.
* Vara en möjliggörare som bygger vidare på ett erfaret team och stöttar nya förmågor, exempelvis inom vårt traineeprogram.
* Bidra till affärsutveckling och rekrytering i Region Syd (Malmö, Halmstad, Växjö).
* Delta i den operativa ledningsgruppen för regionen och bidra till våra strategiska mål.


**Vi Letar Efter Dig Som**
* Har erfarenhet av att bygga moderna, komplexa och distribuerade system med fokus på kvalitet, prestanda och skalbarhet.
* Har djup erfarenhet av att nyttja PaaS-tjänster och designa lösningar som optimerar fördelarna med hyperscalers som GCP och Azure.
* Vill ligga i teknisk framkant och använda vår nära relation och partnerskap med Google och Microsoft för att skapa innovativa lösningar.
* Är konsultmässig, och därmed nyfiken, positiv, modig, pragmatisk, flexibel, framåtlutad, samt trivs i framåtlutade produktorganisationer. Har ledarerfarenhet eller en stark vilja att utvecklas inom ledarskap.
* Kommunicerar väl på svenska och engelska, sprider energi och skapar trivsel omkring dig.


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Vi Erbjuder**
* Möjligheten att forma kultur och gemenskap i en växande region.
* Stark vidareutveckling av dina nuvarande förmågor inom teknik, affär och ledarskap
* Tillgång till tekniska insikter och innovation genom våra partnerskap med Google och Microsoft.
* Stöd i din personliga och professionella utveckling, med tillgång till coaching, utbildningar och nätverk.
* Flexibla arbetstider och fokus på work-life balance.
* En arbetsplats där vi stöttar, firar och utvecklar varandra.
* En kombination av fast lön och resultatbaserad ersättning.


 Vi är ett stöttande, varmt och framåtsträvande team som tror på att göra riktiga avtryck – både för våra kunder och varandra. Är du vår nästa ledare och kollega?

title: Enterprise IAM Architect
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About The Accelerator**
 We rapidly nurture successful businesses and services that will shape the future of assurance. The Accelerator operates a portfolio of units undergoing significant growth, chiefly through acquisitions and partnerships. The Accelerator acts as a greenhouse for a strategically selected portfolio of businesses, each of which serves different industries and markets. The portfolio benefits from dedicated support to rapidly grow through organic means, as well as through acquisitions and partnerships. Three business units were housed in the Accelerator in 2022: Cyber Security, Digital Health, and Inspection.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Our Identity and Access Management team is committed to helping our clients navigate the complex landscape of digital identity and access management. As a leading provider of strategic advisory and business consultancy services, we specialize in delivering innovative and secure solutions that drive business success. We are currently looking for a highly skilled
 **Enterprise IAM Architect** 
 to join our team in
 **Stockholm, Oslo, Hellerup or Amsterdam** 
 .
   

  

**The Enterprise IAM Architect** 
 will play a pivotal role in advising and guiding our clients on their Identity and Access Management (IAM) strategies. This role requires a deep understanding of IAM, with good understanding of Identity Governance and Administration (IGA), Privileged Access Management (PAM), and Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM) solutions. The ideal candidate will not only have technical expertise but also the ability to provide strategic advisory services, helping clients align their IAM initiatives with their overall business objectives.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Serve as a strategic advisor to clients, helping them define and implement IAM strategies that align with their business goals, with a focus on IGA, PAM, and CIAM.
* Lead the design, architecture, and deployment of comprehensive IAM solutions across complex, multi-national environments.
* Collaborate with client stakeholders to understand their business needs and translate them into effective IAM strategies and roadmaps.
* Provide expert guidance on the selection and integration of IAM technologies, ensuring they meet both current and future business requirements.
* Conduct assessments of existing IAM infrastructures, identifying gaps, and recommending improvements.
* Lead workshops, training sessions, and presentations to educate clients on best practices in IGA, PAM, and CIAM.
* Stay current with the latest trends and developments in IAM, advising clients on how to leverage emerging technologies and methodologies.
* Work closely with internal teams and client stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery, from initial consultation through to post-implementation support.


**Location: Preferred location is Stockholm, Sweden but other European locations will be considered for the right candidate.**
 What we offer
   

  

 We offer a place where you can find meaningful work, have fun, be inspired, and respected. With us you will have the opportunity to gain experience from multiple areas of cybersecurity and business. We believe in a culture of empowerment, and we value professionalism in all of its dimensions. Our organization model supports sharing knowledge, working and learning without unit barriers. We offer you the opportunity to work in a leading cyber security company where you find opportunities for professional development and means to balance professional challenges with your personal life. DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture and we invite you to be part of this diversity.
   

  

**About You**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field; Master’s degree preferred.
* 7+ years of experience in IAM, with basic understanding of and specific expertise in at least one of the following areas: IGA, PAM, and CIAM.
* Proven experience in a strategic advisory or business consultancy role, with the ability to influence and guide senior stakeholders.
* Familiar with IAM technologies such as LDAP, SSO, MFA, RBAC, OAuth, SAML, and directory services.
* Experience with IAM platforms such as Okta, Ping Identity, Microsoft Azure AD, or similar.
* Strong knowledge of security frameworks and regulations such as NIST, ISO 27001, and GDPR.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with fluency in English and native proficiency in Norwegian, Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Dutch (specific to location).
* Ability to travel as needed across the Nordic region and the Benelux.


 Need more information?
   

  

 If you have any questions regarding this position, please reach out to the hiring manager pascal.van.vugt@dnv.com

title: Workday Integrations Specialist
description:
**Job Description**
**Role Summary:**
 We are looking for a dedicated Workday Integrations Specialist to join our People Tech team. This role involves crafting and managing integrations within Workday, enhancing system functionality, and providing essential support to our business operations.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
**Integration Development and Management:**
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand integration needs and objectives.
* Design and implement robust integration solutions connecting Workday with internal and external systems using tools such as Workday Studio, EIB, and Core Connectors, Picof/ PECI
* Ensure the accuracy, efficiency, and security of data through comprehensive testing and error management.
* Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing integrations, serving as the primary technical contact for business teams.
* Document all integration processes and maintain a detailed log of system changes and updates.


**System Configuration and Enhancement:**
* Develop custom Workday Extend applications by working closely with business stakeholders to meet their needs.
* Recommend and implement improvements and innovations within the Workday platform.
* Lead the integration aspects of Workday system upgrades, ensuring compatibility and functionality with new releases.


**Compliance and Collaboration:**
* Work alongside the HR team to ensure system security, business process compliance, and alignment with audit requirements such as SOC and SOX.
* Engage with the broader Workday community to stay abreast of new technologies and best practices, using this knowledge to propose solutions that address business challenges.


**Project and Implementation Leadership:**
* Lead Workday integration projects from conception through to successful execution, ensuring alignment with the overall People Tech roadmap.
* Manage the implementation of system configurations, testing, training, and deployment to enhance user adoption and satisfaction.


**Our humble expectations**
**Our humble expectations:**
* 3-4 years of experience in Workday integration development and support, including at least 1 year of experience with Workday Extend.
* Demonstrable knowledge of Workday technologies such as Workday Studio, EIBs, Core Connectors, BIRT Reporting, PECI, Cloud Connectors, and Document Transformation.
* Proficiency in data transformation languages including XSLT and XTT/ETV.
* Strong capability in designing complex reports and dashboards.
* Excellent analytical skills and the ability to manage sensitive and confidential information with discretion.
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a proven track record of effective project management and cross-functional collaboration.
* A Workday integration certification is highly desirable.


**Candidate Profile:**
* You are a creative problem-solver who is enthusiastic about leveraging technology to streamline and enhance business processes.
* You possess a solid understanding of core HR business practices and are adept at applying this knowledge in a technical environment.
* Your approach is proactive, and you are recognized for your organizational skills and your ability to lead projects effectively.
* Join our team and contribute to our mission of maximizing the potential of our HR technologies to drive business success.


**Next Steps**
**Why you'll love working with us**
 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going! If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!
   

  

 Wolt is a Finnish technology company and we’re best known for our food delivery platform. In 2017, Wolt operated in 4 countries and 10 cities across the Nordics. Fast forward to today, we’re a team of 12,000+ people in 27 countries and over 500+ cities, servicing over 41 million registered users. As the platform economy is changing the ways consumers connect with restaurants and retailers, we're seeing a huge opportunity to be the industry leader with the amazing teams we have built globally.
   

  

**What You’ll Get By Joining Us**
* Opportunity to be part of building something exceptional, in an international environment
* Lots of learning and growth in a globally scaling tech company


 Please note that
 **we do not accept applications sent by mail** 
 . You should submit your application through our careers website!
   

  

**About Wolt**
*Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants, and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants), and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 31 countries today, 27 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.*
***So, why work at Wolt?***
**At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.**
 You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself, and being around friendly, humble, and ambitious people.
   

  

*We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.*
***Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.*
*Join us today to build Wolt together.*

title: Application Consultant
description:
**Job Title** 




 Senior Snowflake Consultant
 



  





**Competencies** 




 Digital : Snowflake
 



  





**Location** 




 Sweden- Stockholm
 



  





**Experience Range** 




 6 & Above
 



  





**Salary Bill Rate** 




 As per market rate
 



  





**Non English Language Dependency** 




 English
 



  





**Remote Working Yes/No** 




 Onsite

 6-12 Months (B2B/ Freelance contract)
 



  





**JD** 




 As a Senior Snowflake Consultant, you will play a pivotal role in designing, implementing, and optimizing Snowflake solution for Vattenfall.
 



 We are currently using a SQL server solution on prem which need to be implemented in a greenfield approach in Snowflake.
 



 You will work closely with internal and external stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide expert guidance on best practices for data warehousing and analytics.

 \* Develop and maintain ETL processes using Snowflake.

 \* Stay up-to-date with the latest Snowflake features and industry trends (data sharing)
 



  





**Qualifications:** 




 \* Proven experience as a Snowflake Consultant or similar role.
 



 \* 5+ years of experience in data warehousing, data architecture, and analytics.
 



 \* In-depth knowledge of Snowflake architecture and best practices.
 



 \* Strong SQL and data modeling skills.
 



 \* Experience with ETL tools and processes.
 



 \* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
 



 \* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
 



 \* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 



 \* Completed 1 or more Snowflake greenfield implementations. Preferred
 



  









**Qualifications:** 




 \* Snowflake certification.
 



 \* Experience with cloud platforms such like Azure
 



 \* Familiarity with data visualization tools like Power BI.
 



 \* Knowledge of SAP S/4 Hana, Datasphere, CDS views
 



  





**Soft Skills:** 




 \*
 **Strong communication skills** 
 : Ability to clearly convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
 



 \*
 **Problem-solving mindset** 
 : Proactive in identifying issues and developing effective solutions.
 



 \*
 **Leadership** 
 : Capable of guiding and mentoring junior team members.
 



 \*
 **Collaboration:** 
 Works well in a team environment and fosters a positive team culture.
 



 \*
 **Adaptability** 
 : Comfortable with changing priorities and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
 



 \*
 **Attention to detail** 
 : Ensures accuracy and thoroughness in all work.

title: Technical Analyst
description:
**Job Description**
 Technical Analyst
   

  

**This is Worldline**
 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
   

  

**The O** 
**pportunity**
 We’re looking to hire a temporary IT Technical Support Agent who will be based in Stockholm. The contract is initially till 2025-09-08 but there could be possibility for extension. In this role, you’ll support employees in Sweden and other Nordic countries with a wide area of IT-related matters, and be part of a Nordic Virtual Team. You will be required to travel on occasion.
   

  

 Since you are part of the international team, we hope you are able travel if needed to. You’ll work during office hours, but occasionally we might need your support in ad-hoc situations out of normal business hours. We wish to welcome an enthusiastic and dedicated colleague to join our team!
   

  

**About The Team**
 We have many hardworking and dedicated peers that would love for you to work with them. We are committed to continuous improvement. We are always looking for new and innovative ways to improve our market proposition, build excellent solutions, and grow customer happiness.
   

  

 You’ll report to IT Manager who is based in Stockholm, Sweden. The virtual team consists 3 peers in Sweden, 1 in Denmark and 1 in Finland. We are globally minded with a FinTech atmosphere. You will experience this in your everyday life as a Worldliner.
   

  

**Day-to-Day Responsibilities** 
  

  

* 
+ Ongoing support for any local systems, services and administrative activities currently in the scope of the Local IT team which are not replaced by services delivered centrally
+ CMDB maintenance
+ Installations and settings-laptops
+ Maintain all devices connected to WL network (printers, access badge printer, Wi-Fi routers, tv-screens, etc.)


**Who Are We Looking For**
 People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. You consider yourself being organized and able to prioritize multiple ongoing tasks and are used to tackle challenges proactively. Natural interest towards IT and problem solving mindset are advantage in this position.
   

  

**Skills We Can't Do Without**
* OS management in a mixed environment (Windows, MacOS, iOS, Android)
* Desktop imaging and deployment practices
* Experience with purchasing, inventory, and asset management
* Microsoft Azure admin
* Setup and support printer system (MFPs) in a corporate environment.
* Open to change and must be able to adapt to new systems quickly.


**Skills We'd Like**
* Experience with Servicenow
* Drivers license and car
* Network fundamentals (patching, network configs, VPN, Firewalls, wireless, etc.)
* Experience with ticket-based enterprise workflow management systems, particularly JIRA, Confluence, as well as other Atlassian products.
* Self-motivated, with out of the box thinking and a logical mind.


**Perks & Benefits**
 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
   

  

* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2:nd year
* Private Health Care Insurance (EuroAccident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.


**Shape the evolution.**
 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
   

  

**Learn more about life at Worldline at** 
**jobs.worldline.com**
**We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.**

title: Identity & Access Management (IAM) Specialist
description:
We are looking for an IAM Specialist to manage and enhance our access management platform while driving improvements to security, compliance, and user experience. If you thrive in a hands-on role and want to influence the way we work with IAM, this is your opportunity!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an Identity & Access Management (IAM) Specialist, you will play a crucial role in overseeing the day-to-day management and continuous improvement of NOBA’s identity management systems. You will collaborate with Cyber Security (CISO), system specialists, and other key stakeholders to develop and implement IAM strategies, policies, and processes. With NOBA transitioning further into cloud based services, you will be instrumental in strengthening our IAM framework and ensuring compliance with banking regulations. In more detail, your areas of responsibility will include:
   

  

* Manage and enhance NOBA’s identity management systems, ensuring security, compliance, and efficiency.
* Oversee access certifications, role-based access, application integrations, SSO, PIM/PAM, and IAM improvements.
* Identify opportunities to improve IAM strategy and collaborate with stakeholders to refine policies and processes.
* Drive the transition to cloud-based IdP (Identity providers) solutions and align IAM strategies with access management goals.
* Implement and maintain IAM solutions for identity lifecycle management, governance, and security.
* Troubleshoot IAM-related issues and ensure system reliability.
* Develop IAM governance frameworks to meet regulatory requirements (e.g., DORA).
* Improve automation of routine activities and integration with connected systems.
* Participate in and contribute to audits, access reviews, and risk assessments to ensure a secure IAM environment.
* Lead the migration from on-premises Active Directory to a cloud-based IdP solution.


 You would be a part of our IT infrastructure team, currently consisting of 9 people located working in both Stockholm and Oslo! Considering your broad collaborative landscape on a group level, the role would include some travelling days to our Oslo office per year.
   

  

**We Are Looking For You Who Has**
* Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Minimum of 2 years of experience with managing cloud privileged Identities on various cloud platforms
* At least 3 years of hands-on experience with IAM solutions in Microsoft EntraID/Azure AD
* Expertise in IAM concepts like SSO, MFA, identity governance, and access control.
* Very good understanding of IAM concepts and its underlying processes
* Knowledge and experience in ITSM tools (JIRA/Confluence) and agile processes
* Fluency in English (written & spoken)


**It's Positive If You Have**
* Worked in a complex environment using multiple IdPs
* Knowledge of financial regulatory requirements such as DORA
* Relevant certifications (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Identity and Access Administrator Associate)


**To thrive and perform well in the role, we believe that you need to be:**
 A problem-solver who stays calm under pressure and can navigate fast-paced, high-impact situations. You have a strong understanding of IT environments, enabling you to diagnose and resolve IAM-related challenges effectively. Your critical and creative thinking allows you to explore innovative solutions within the IAM domain. Additionally, you excel at communicating complex technical issues clearly to technical teams, vendors, and stakeholders, ensuring alignment and understanding across all levels.
   

  

 In addition to this, it is important to us that you recognize yourself in our values: we are wholehearted, we collaborate and we take the lead.
   

  

**Practical Information**
 Start: By agreement
   

  

 Location: Stockholm
   

  

 Form of employment: Permanent position, full-time (we apply 6 months probation period)
   

  

 Working hours: 37,5
   

  

 Fixed wage 💰
   

  

**Have you heard of NOBAVERSE?**
 In our NOBAVERSE, we value openness, trust, and diversity. Here, you can influence your own development and have fun along the way to achieving our goals – all in a workplace that’s a little extra
 *bubbly* 
 ! ✨
   

  

 Read more about our employee value proposition on our careers page.
   

  

 We strive for diversity of knowledge and experiences among our employees and welcome all applicants who are qualified for the position. We are committed to a recruitment process free from discrimination that provides equal opportunities for all.
   

  

**What happens when you have submitted your application?**
 The number of steps in the recruitment process may vary depending on the position you are applying for, but we always try to keep the process as short and concise as possible, to protect your application experience. You can read more about how our recruitment process works in the FAQ.
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns about the position, please contact the responsible recruiter Sarah Wahlstedt Corméry, sarah.wahlstedt.cormery@nordax.se .
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application! 🙏✨
   

  

*NOBA Bank protects your privacy and, with reference to the GDPR, would like to ask you not to include any sensitive personal data in your application. Examples of sensitive personal data can be information about ethnic origin, political opinions, religious beliefs or information about your health, such as sick leave. If you have protected personal information, please inform the responsible recruiter so that we can handle your personal data correctly.*

title: Solutions Engineer
description:
* Ansök senast: 31 mars 2025


 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

**Vill du arbeta som Solutions Engineer på ett av Sveriges snabbast växande techföretag? Hos oss får du en unik inblick i hur ett börsnoterat tillväxtbolag (som också är lönsamt och skuldfritt) fungerar från insidan och möjligheten att arbeta i ett av branschens mest högpresterande team.**
 Vi älskar att hjälpa snabbväxande B2B-företag att hitta nya leads, vinna fler affärer och växa befintliga kunder. Vi fortsätter växa och är ständigt på jakt efter nya talanger där vi alltid erbjuder ett nästa karriärsteg för dem som visar initiativ och levererar konsekventa resultat.
   

  

***Ditt uppdrag hos oss***
 Tillsammans med ett drivet team, arbetar du för att fortsätta effektivisera försäljningsprocessen för att nå våra högt satta tillväxtmål. Som Solutions Engineer kommer du att stödja våra säljteam under säljprocesser genom att utifrån kundens behov ta fram och presentera anpassade lösningar, samt agera teknisk produktspecialist under hela säljprocessen.
   

  

***I dina arbetsuppgifter ingår att stötta säljteamet och kundansvariga i att stänga fler affärer genom att:***
* Besitta extremt god produktkunskap och hålla dig uppdaterad med den produktutveckling som löpande sker.
* Förstå prospekts och kunders utmaningar och hur Upsales kan lösa deras problem
* Ta fram kundanpassade lösningar, demonstrera dessa och påvisa värdet av den föreslagna lösningen
* Genomföra workshops och proof-of-concepts
* Agera trusted advisor under säljprocessen och reda ut tekniska utmaningar och frågetecken


***Därför ska du välja Upsales***
**Ekonomiskt stabilt tillväxtbolag** 
 - Du kommer till en organisation med lång historik av effektiv och lönsam tillväxt utan riskkapital eller extern finansiering, vilket skapar stabilitet jämfört med konkurrenter som ofta tvingas varsla och dra i bromsen under tuffare tider. Upsales har även en engagerad huvudägare som också är VD och grundare.
   

  

**Möjlighet att utvecklas -** 
 Du får goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och tillgång till världens främsta utbildningsplattform inom försäljning och ledarskap, med löpande coaching, utbildningar och inspirerande lunchföreläsningar.
   

  

**Entreprenöriell arbetsmiljö -** 
 Du får vara i en driven och dynamisk arbetsmiljö med korta beslutsvägar. Vi präglas av en stark entreprenörsanda och har en engagerad VD och grundare. Upsales har vunnit pris som t.ex. Di Gasell, Årets IPO (2019) och ligger långt över branschstandard i pulsmätningar inom områden som t.ex. arbetsglädje, samarbete och ledarskap.
   

  

 Utöver detta får du också:
   

  

* Omfattande introduktions- och karriärplan
* Mindfulness-konto och gym
* Frukost på kontoret varje morgon
* Två årliga kickoffs för företaget
* Konkurrenskraftigt kompensationspaket och sex veckors semester/år


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Du har en kombination av teknisk kunnighet, kommersiellt tänk och en grym kommunikationsförmåga. Om du dessutom är personen som aldrig ger upp utan hittar lösningar där andra ser hinder, är du sannolikt rätt person för oss. Utöver det tror vi att:
   

  

* Du har tidigare erfarenhet som Solutions Engineer, alternativt erfarenhet inom projektledning och/eller kundanpassning inom mjukvarubranschen (helst CRM, Marketing Automation eller ERP) och en teknisk eller ingenjörsvetenskaplig universitetsexamen (eller motsvarande)
* Du är snabblärd och älskar att grotta ner dig i detaljer
* Du har en god teknisk förståelse, främst avseende IT, APIer och integrationer
* Du talar flytande svenska och engelska
* Du tidigare kan ha arbetat med försäljning och nu vill gå över till den tekniska sidan

title: Services Project Manager
description:
**Siemens Digital Industries Software** 
 is a leading provider of solutions for the design, simulation, and manufacture of products across many different industries. Formula 1 cars, skyscrapers, ships, space exploration vehicles, and many of the objects we see in our daily lives are being conceived and manufactured using our Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software.
   

  

 Are you an experienced
 **Project Manager** 
 with a passion for innovation, agility, and delivering outstanding client experience? If you have a
 **PLM / Manufacturing background** 
 and are ready to take your project management career to new heights, we would love to hear from you!
   

  

 As part of the Services organisation, you’ll be at the forefront of driving projects to success by embracing an agile approach and keeping the client journey and satisfaction at the heart of everything you do. Whilst delivering the project(s) within the defined targeted outcomes, such as financial, schedule, scope and quality, it is paramount that you have a strong focus on realizing customer value by performing successful projects. You will have the opportunity to collaborate with cross-functional teams, leverage advanced technologies, and shape the future of industrial digitalization.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Drive value realization and ensure high-quality, on-time, and within-budget project delivery
* Establish and implement project structure and governance, demonstrating Siemens Delivery Framework
* Lead end-to-end project management, including planning, execution, monitoring, and control
* Manage project financials and proactively identify and minimise risks
* Use agile methodologies to improve collaboration, adaptability, and continuous improvement
* Building strong client and stakeholder relationships, acting as a trusted advisor
* Track project performance, report key metrics, and provide insights to senior management
* Promote innovation, best practices, and creative problem-solving within the team


**Qualifications**
* Degree or equivalent experience in Engineering, Computer Science, Business Administration or a related field
* Strong agile methodology experience
* Proven expertise in project management in software implementation, PLM, and/or manufacturing
* Business-minded with a strategic perspective on service organizations
* Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills to engage clients and stakeholders
* Analytical problem-solver with a track record of delivering projects on time and within budget, exceeding client expectations
* Self-motivated, collaborative, and adaptable to challenges
* Proficient in English and Swedish
* Willing to travel (to clients sites) when required


**Nice to have**
* Project management certifications (PMP, Agile, Scrum)


 We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
   

  

**We are Siemens**
 A collection of over 377,000 minds building the future, one day at a time in over 200 countries. We're dedicated to equality, and we welcome applications that reflect the diversity of the communities we work in. All employment decisions at Siemens are based on qualifications, merit, and business need. Bring your curiosity and creativity and help us shape tomorrow!
   

  

 We offer a comprehensive reward package which includes a competitive basic salary, bonus scheme, generous holiday allowance, pension, and private healthcare.
   

  

**Transform the everyday**
 #diswgscsemea

title: Solutions Engineer AI - Nordics
company_industry: Computer Hardware Manufacturing, Software Development, and Computer Networking Products
description:
**What You’ll Do**
 We are seeking a senior Solutions Engineer - Artificial Intelligence (AI) to join our dynamic sales team. As a Solutions Engineer (AI), you will drive the adoption of our AI solutions across various industries. You will identify potential clients across the EMEA region, understand their specific business needs, and provide tailored AI solutions that enhance their operations. This role requires a deep understanding of AI technologies and experience relaying technical concepts to a diverse audience.
   

  

**Who You’ll Work With**
 The Cloud and AI Infrastructure team is responsible for helping customers change their business using Cisco technology in the data center and cloud. The team works with customers, partners and engineering teams to take customer problems and turn them into business advantage.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re energized by the fast-paced landscape in IT and how AI is changing the world. You love technology and thrive in solving complex problems. You are an amazing presenter and can translate complex technical scenarios into a simple easy to understand message. You inspire those around to use technology in innovative ways and use a hands on methods to demonstrate your ideas.
   

  

**Minimum Experience:**
* 5+ years of technical presales experience (preferably selling Compute, Storage, and/or DC Networking solutions). Must include track record of selling to LoB and or AI Practitioner
+ Practical knowledge of AI/ML frameworks (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face etc.),
+ Good understanding of programming/scripting languages inc. Python
+ Solid understanding of the latest industry advancements in AI and machine learning technologies, tools, and trends.
+ Excellent presentation skills – ability to value-sell and deliver engaging workshops to both technical and non-technical audiences on AI and/or infrastructure topics.


**Preferred Qualifications:**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field or equivalent experience. Advanced degree in Data Science is a plus.
+ Experience with AI relevant infrastructure, including Networking (InfiniBand and RoCE), Storage (FC, IP and scale out) and AI accelerators (GPUs etc).
+ In-depth understanding of AI models, including but not limited to GPT, Llama, Resnet or similar. Any hands-on experience in the design, develop, and deploy of AI models and algorithms to address business needs and improve operational efficiency would be a bonus.
+ Familiarity with containerization (Kubernetes etc


**Why Cisco**
- 

 #WeAreCisco. We are all unique, but collectively we bring our talents to work as a team, to develop innovative technology and power a more inclusive, digital future for everyone. How do we do it? Well, for starters – with people like you!
   

  

 Nearly every internet connection around the world touches Cisco. We’re the Internet’s optimists. Our technology makes sure the data traveling at light speed across connections does so securely, yet it’s not what we make but what we make happen which marks us out. We’re helping those who work in the health service to connect with patients and each other; schools, colleges, and universities to teach in even the most challenging of times. We’re helping businesses of all shapes and sizes to connect with their employees and customers in new ways, providing people with access to the digital skills they need and connecting the most remote parts of the world – whether through 5G, or otherwise.
   

  

 We tackle whatever challenges come our way. We have each other’s backs, we recognize our accomplishments, and we grow together. We celebrate and support one another – from big and small things in life to big career moments. And giving back is in our DNA (we get 10 days off each year to do just that).
   

  

 We know that powering an inclusive future starts with us. Because without diversity and a dedication to equality, there is no moving forward. Our 30 Inclusive Communities, that bring people together around commonalities or passions, are leading the way. Together we’re committed to learning, listening, caring for our communities, whilst supporting the most vulnerable with a collective effort to make this world a better place either with technology, or through our actions.
   

  

 So, you have colorful hair? Don’t care. Tattoos? Show off your ink. Like polka dots? That’s cool. Pop culture geek? Many of us are. Passion for technology and world changing? Be you, with us! #WeAreCisco
